frontMatter.title: Address block
frontMatter.description: Highlights mailing addresses, contact information, and personal information

when_to_use.value: Addresses in content blocks where the blue bar aids scanning
Form intro pages needing mailing addresses displayed
Calling out addresses within paragraph or list contexts

when_to_consider_else.value: Addresses directly below a clear "Address" header (unnecessary on VA Health Center pages)
Phone numbers in isolation; use [Telephone](/docs/components/telephone) component instead

content_considerations.value: Spell out street names completely; avoid abbreviations
Defer to local compass point conventions (e.g., "N." vs. "North")
Format zip codes as 5-digit or with hyphen for extended format (12345-6789)
Write "PO" without periods for PO Box
Don't require Veterans to provide 9-digit zip codes; 5 digits is sufficient
Format provided addresses consistently with hyphenated extended zip codes

accessibility.value: The component uses semantic HTML to ensure addresses are properly announced by screen readers
The visual styling (blue bar) provides additional context for sighted users
Ensure address content is logically structured with appropriate line breaks
